title: Michael Gargiulo // 23
description:
In 1993, an 18-year-old girl is murdered outside her home in Glenview, Illinois. When the police start considering her neighbor as a potential suspect, he flees to Los Angeles where he continues to stalk, watch, and murder other young women. The trial for him just began on May 2, 2019 and has made national headlines as they try to put this monster away for good. This is the case of Michael Gargiulo.
**GOING WEST DOES NOT OWN ANY OF THE NEWS CLIPS PRESENTED**
